about_the_game:
In "Vaca Bullet" you will step into the shoes of a cowboy in the Wild West, who must defend his vacas(cows) from the dreaded bullets of bandits trying to steal them. This game is a tribute to those "Western" movies, full of shootouts and chases, all achieved through beautiful pixel art that seeks to give it a raw and unique essence like a true western.

"Vaca Bullet" is easy and simple to learn to play, but that doesn't take away from how challenging the game can be, as it seeks to recreate shootouts and frenetic battles where bullets cross the screen in a matter of seconds, and a single bullet can kill both you and your enemies.

The game offers you a wide range of weapons inspired by the Old West, with a six-shooter revolver being the most iconic weapon in the game, a shotgun that fires multiple bullets at once, and a bow that can shoot across the sky without exposing you to enemy fire.

Finally, if you thought that was all, there's another layer of depth, as you must be careful where you shoot. Bullets take time to reload, and you could accidentally kill your cows or even yourself if a bullet ricochets off a cactus.

FEATURES

  • A frenetic pixel art game set in the Old West.

  • A short game full of fast and addictive shootouts.

  • Easy-to-learn and easy-to-use controls.

  • 3 types of weapons.

name: Vaca Bullet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM

short_description: In "Vaca Bullet," you play as a cowboy in the Wild West defending your cows from bandits' bullets. The game is a tribute to classic Western movies, filled with shootouts and chases, brought to life through beautiful pixel art, giving it a raw and unique essence like a true western.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
